trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, você acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> uses standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> methods to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> usa padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> métodos para manipular a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> método para determinar se existe um valor de propriedade específica na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> método para determinar o índice de qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objeto dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre criar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos e adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> antes de adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adiciona um vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> com uma validade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> valor à coleção, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos são gerados automaticamente para você.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Consequentemente, uma exceção será lançada se você tentar adicionar uma nova <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos com duplicata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints information about each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir imprime as informações sobre cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a column style to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um estilo de coluna à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice do novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates several <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and adds each to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> of two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria várias <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos e adiciona cada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> de dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objetos.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a serem adicionados à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of column style objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma matriz de objetos de estilo de coluna à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add the array to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria uma matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objetos e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.AddRange%2A> método para adicionar a matriz de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.CollectionChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> contains a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> contém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> específico.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associated with the desired <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> desejado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> contém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a coleção contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a specific column.
trans-unit.target: Passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> para retornar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para uma coluna específica.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists before invoking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the item.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> método para determinar se um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> existe antes de chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> método para remover o item.

trans-unit.target: Se você precisa saber o índice de um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to find.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> or -1 if no corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> exists.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> dentro do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> ou então -1, se nenhum <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> correspondente existe.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> método para determinar se um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> existe.

trans-unit.source: If so, and you need the index of the element within the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, e é necessário o índice do elemento na coleção, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a given <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> método para determinar se um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> existe em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: If so, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method is invoked with the index to remove the element from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> método retorna o índice do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> método é invocado com o índice para remover o elemento da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> especificado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.

trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> associated the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> associado especificado <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is created using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> é criado usando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> can be returned using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.PropertyDescriptor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> podem ser retornadas usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.PropertyDescriptor%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> for a specific data source, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> para uma fonte de dados específicos, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a specific column.
trans-unit.target: Passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> para retornar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> para uma coluna específica.

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and then passes it as an argument to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte código de exemplo obtém uma <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> de um <xref:System.Data.DataTable> em uma <xref:System.Data.DataSet>e, em seguida, passa-lo como um argumento para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> em um índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> método para determinar o índice de qualquer elemento na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Item%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified column header.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> com o cabeçalho de coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: The column header of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> can be set explicitly by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O cabeçalho da coluna de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> pode ser definido explicitamente, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> is set using uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> é definido usando usa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The comparison between column headers and the value to look for is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: A comparação entre o valor para procurar e cabeçalhos de coluna não diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> named in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> nomeado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Item%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> containing the collection items.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> que contém os itens da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> que contém o evento de dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> especificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> método para determinar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example removes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo remove uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> com o índice especificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> método para determinar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> método para determinar o índice de qualquer elemento na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a given <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> método para determinar se um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> existe em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.

trans-unit.source: If so, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method is invoked with the index to remove the element from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> método retorna o índice do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> método é invocado com o índice para remover o elemento da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> for each column style in the collection to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> para cada estilo de coluna na coleção para <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero na matriz em que a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia a coleção para um <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional compatível, começando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> é maior do que o espaço disponível de <paramref name="index" /> até o final do <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> não pode ser convertido automaticamente no tipo de <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de elementos contidos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos contidos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" /> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador para a coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> para a coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the value has been added.
trans-unit.target: O índice no qual o valor foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> não pode ser convertido para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an element is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um elemento está na coleção.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o elemento estiver na coleção, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência do objeto especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the <paramref name="value" /> parameter within the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero da primeira ocorrência do parâmetro <paramref name="value" /> dentro da coleção, se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero no qual o <c>valor</c> deve ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser inserido na coleção.

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Este controle não dá suporte para este método.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: Sempre lançada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do elemento a ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: An operation attempts to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação que tenta definir essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> especificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be cast to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> não pode ser convertido para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> at the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> no índice especificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection" />.
